name: Thyef
description:
Point, click, and scamper like a mouse,
for riches untold in a strange house.
As a thief you only have one goal,
The diamond is the ticket to your payroll.

Note:

Firefox seems to have some lag issues with sound, chrome looks like it work fine. This isn't too big of a deal, but feel free to download the local versions below if it's an issue (although I haven't tested the Linux or Mac builds).

The game came about as a project after researching about and creating a 3d software renderer. I hope you enjoy!
